languages.text: "В таком случае позвольте мне быть первым". {n}Губернатор Драйвстем щелкает пальцами, и несколько слуг приближаются к вам с дарами в руках. Урбенд указывает на тонкий кривой клинок {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}.{/n} "Этот прекрасный трофей мои солдаты взяли с тела одного из командиров {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}. Это оружие слишком великолепно и запретно для всех, кроме Вашей милости".

traits.locale_text: "В таком случае позвольте мне быть первым". {n}Губернатор Драйвстем щелкает пальцами, и несколько слуг приближаются к вам с дарами в руках. Урбенд указывает на тонкий кривой клинок друкхари.{/n} "Этот прекрасный трофей мои солдаты взяли с тела одного из командиров ксеносов. Это оружие слишком прекрасно и запретно для всех, кроме Вашей милости".

languages.text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае позвольте мне быть первым". {n}Губернатор Драйвстем щелкает пальцами, и несколько слуг приближаются к вам с дарами в руках. Урбенд указывает на тонкий кривой клинок {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}.{/n} "Этот прекрасный трофей мои солдаты взяли с тела одного из командиров {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}. Это оружие слишком великолепно и запретно для всех, кроме Вашей милости".

traits.locale_text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to express them." {n}Urbend snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. Urbend points at a thin, curved Drukhari blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy off the body of one of the xenos commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"In that case, allow me to be the first to express them." {n}Urbend snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. Urbend points at a thin, curved Drukhari blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy off the body of one of the xenos commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: 「でしたら、先んじて私が述べましょう」{n}ドライブステムが指を鳴らすと、数人の従者が贈答品を持ってあなたに近づく。総督は{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}の薄い、湾曲した刃を指し示す。{/n}「我が兵が{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の司令官の骸から、この素晴らしい戦利品を奪いました。この美しくも、禁じられた武器が見合うのは、陛下をおいて他におりません」
languages.original_text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「でしたら、先んじて私が述べましょう」{n}ドライブステムが指を鳴らすと、数人の従者が贈答品を持ってあなたに近づく。総督は{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}の薄い、湾曲した刃を指し示す。{/n}「我が兵が{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の司令官の骸から、この素晴らしい戦利品を奪いました。この美しくも、禁じられた武器が見合うのは、陛下をおいて他におりません」

languages.text: “既然如此，请允许我第一个献上礼物。”{n}德莱夫斯塔打了个响指，几个仆人拿着礼物朝你走来。德莱夫斯塔指着一把又轻又薄{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}弯刀。{/n}“这件了不起的战利品，是我的士兵从{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}指挥官的尸体上搜刮来的。这件武器是如此华美，除了大人您之外，谁都不配享有。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，请允许我第一个献上礼物。”{n}德莱夫斯塔打了个响指，几个仆人拿着礼物朝你走来。德莱夫斯塔指着一把又轻又薄{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}弯刀。{/n}“这件了不起的战利品，是我的士兵从{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}指挥官的尸体上搜刮来的。这件武器是如此华美，除了大人您之外，谁都不配享有。”

languages.text: «En ese caso, permítame ser el primero en ofrecerle la mía». {n}Drivestem chasquea los dedos y varios sirvientes se acercan con regalos. El gobernador señala a una espada {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} fina y curva.{/n} «Mis soldados arrebataron este espléndido trofeo al cadáver de uno de los comandantes {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Es un arma demasiado hermosa e ilícita para cualquiera, excepto para mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, permítame ser el primero en ofrecerle la mía». {n}Drivestem chasquea los dedos y varios sirvientes se acercan con regalos. El gobernador señala a una espada {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} fina y curva.{/n} «Mis soldados arrebataron este espléndido trofeo al cadáver de uno de los comandantes {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Es un arma demasiado hermosa e ilícita para cualquiera, excepto para mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, permettez-moi d'être le premier à vous les présenter. » {n}D'un claquement de doigts, Drivestem fait venir plusieurs serviteurs chargés de cadeaux, puis il désigne une fine lame {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}drukhari{/g} courbée.{/n} « Mes soldats ont arraché ce trophée au cadavre de l'un des commandants {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. J'ai pensé qu'une arme d'une telle beauté, bien que sacrilège, ne pouvait revenir à {mf|nul|nulle} autre que Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, permettez-moi d'être le premier à vous les présenter. » {n}D'un claquement de doigts, Drivestem fait venir plusieurs serviteurs chargés de cadeaux, puis il désigne une fine lame {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}drukhari{/g} courbée.{/n} « Mes soldats ont arraché ce trophée au cadavre de l'un des commandants {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. J'ai pensé qu'une arme d'une telle beauté, bien que sacrilège, ne pouvait revenir à {mf|nul|nulle} autre que Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "In dem Fall gestattet mir, sie Euch als Erster auszusprechen." {n}Drivestem schnippt mit den Fingern, und mehrere Diener treten mit Geschenken an dich heran. Der Gouverneur deutet auf eine dünne, gekrümmte {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}-Klinge.{/n} "Meine Soldaten haben diese großartige Trophäe von der Leiche eines {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Commanders. Die Waffe wäre für jeden außer Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu schön und verboten."
languages.original_text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "In dem Fall gestattet mir, sie Euch als Erster auszusprechen." {n}Drivestem schnippt mit den Fingern, und mehrere Diener treten mit Geschenken an dich heran. Der Gouverneur deutet auf eine dünne, gekrümmte {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}-Klinge.{/n} "Meine Soldaten haben diese großartige Trophäe von der Leiche eines {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Commanders. Die Waffe wäre für jeden außer Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu schön und verboten."

languages.text: "O hâlde ilk olarak ben tebrik edeyim." {n}Drivestem'in parlak şıklatmasıyla, ellerinde hediye taşıyan birkaç hizmetkâr sana yaklaşıyor. Vali, ince ve kavisli bir {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} kılıcını işaret ediyor.{/n} "Askerlerim, bu fevkalade ganimeti bir {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} komutanının leşinden almıştı. Bu silah, sizden başkasına yakışmayacak kadar güzel ve özeldir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "In that case, allow me to be the first to offer them." {n}Drivestem snaps his fingers, and several servants approach you with gifts. The governor points at a thin, curved {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} blade.{/n} "My soldiers took this splendid trophy from the body of one of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} commanders. The weapon is too beautiful and forbidden for anyone but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde ilk olarak ben tebrik edeyim." {n}Drivestem parmak şıklatınca, ellerinde hediye taşıyan birkaç hizmetkâr sana yaklaşıyor. Vali, ince ve kavisli bir {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} kılıcına işaret ediyor.{/n} "Askerlerim, bu fevkalade ganimeti bir {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} komutanının leşinden almıştı. Bu silah, sizden başkasına yakışmayacak kadar güzel ve yasaklıdır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
